description:
Learn the ABCs as you laugh through this whimsical book app with friendly and familiar characters. Tap individual letters and words to hear them sounded out and practice reading with record and share! You'll be a reading whiz in no time. Do YOU know your ABCS? 

This sample app contains the first 5 pages of the digital book app. 

Start Reading: 
TAP letters and words to hear them sounded out 
ENCOURAGE literacy skills with highlighted narration 
PRACTICE reading by recording your own voice 
FOLLOW along with 3 fun ways to read 
SELECT a scene with easy-to-use navigation 
KEEP kids in the story with parental controls 

-------------------------------------- 

The Reviews Are In: 

- "Superb implementation!" - Wired Magazine 
- "A spectacular adaptation" 4.5 out of 5 mice - Macworld 
- Silver Honor - Parents' Choice Awards 

-------------------------------------- 

We'd Love To Hear From You! 

- Please share your thoughts in a review! Your experience matters to us. 
- Need tech support? Contact us at support@omapp.com 
- Say hello to us on FB! facebook.com/oceanhousemedia 

Official Dr. Seuss licensed App. Dr. Seuss Properties ™ & © 2010 Dr. Seuss Enterprises, L.P. All rights reserved.
